Graph to data frame

Source: R/graph_utils.R
graph2df.Rd

Convert graph object to dataframe with source and target columns

graph2df(graph)

Arguments

graph

Network

Value

data frame

Examples

dag <- create_random_DAG(30, 0.2)
graph2df(dag)

#>    source sink
#> 1      n1  n11
#> 2      n1  n19
#> 3      n1  n16
#> 4      n1  n18
#> 5      n2  n15
#> 6      n2  n18
#> 7      n2  n28
#> 8      n2  n27
#> 9      n2  n29
#> 10     n2  n25
#> 11     n3  n20
#> 12     n3  n19
#> 13     n3  n18
#> 14     n3  n21
#> 15     n3  n29
#> 16     n4   n8
#> 17     n4  n14
#> 18     n4  n12
#> 19     n4  n23
#> 20     n4  n21

#> 22     n4  n29

#> 24     n5   n9
